title: New approach to hitting the gym: Optimizing weight and endurance training

title_detail.value: New approach to hitting the gym: Optimizing weight and endurance training

summary: Sports scientists are warning that fatigue from weight training can carry over to endurance training and the two activities must be better coordinated to maximize athletes' performance.

summary_detail.value: Sports scientists are warning that fatigue from weight training can carry over to endurance training and the two activities must be better coordinated to maximize athletes' performance.
